abstract.p: Westchester County Assn schedules annual government reception for September 12 at MBIA corporate headquarters in Armonk, NY (S)

block.p: The Westchester County Association will hold its annual government reception Sept. 12 from 5 to 7 p.m. at the MBIA corporate headquarters at 113 King Street in Armonk.

Lawrence E. Dwyer Jr., the association's president, said the reception will give members an opportunity to meet informally with government officials, including members of Congress. ''There is no set agenda,'' he said, ''just a relaxed atmosphere in which to meet socially, network and exchange good conversation.''
The Westchester County Association will hold its annual government reception Sept. 12 from 5 to 7 p.m. at the MBIA corporate headquarters at 113 King Street in Armonk.

Lawrence E. Dwyer Jr., the association's president, said the reception will give members an opportunity to meet informally with government officials, including members of Congress. ''There is no set agenda,'' he said, ''just a relaxed atmosphere in which to meet socially, network and exchange good conversation.''
Mr. Dwyer observed that collectively the association's 700 members employ more than 200,000 people in Westchester.
Tickets to the reception are $40 for members and nonmembers. The number to call for reservations and information is (914) 948-6444.
